title: backpacker.gr free fonts
content:
[http://www.backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013233315/http:/www.backpacker.gr/)

20+ fonts in TrueType and OpenType format.

They support greek and they are free to use (on a Creative Commons License)

I would be glad to see how you used them :-)

George Triantafyllakos
author: gtrianta
